entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 p.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow after midnight. Snow near Lake Louise this evening and after midnight. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Snow near Lake Louise in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1800 metres near noon. Snowfall amount 10 cm near Lake Louise. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow near Lake Louise early in the evening. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
